org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel
Class AeAutoLayout

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.AeAutoLayout
public class AeAutoLayout
extends java.lang.Object

AeAutoLayout laysout the BPEL activities using the algorithm found in the AWF Designer.

isContainerMember

public static boolean isContainerMember(AeBpelObjectBase aContainer,
                                        AeBpelObjectBase aNode)
Determines if a node is a member of the container at any level. Note this method is recursive.

Parameters:
aContainer - the container we are searching
aNode - the node we are looking for
Returns:
boolean flag (true if is child, false otherwise)

getParentList

Parameters:
aContainer - the container we are processing
aChild - child node which we want parents for
Returns:
a list of AeBpelActivityObject parent objects.
